content: I got an email from Mozilla folks today, @simulacrum and @Pietro Albini it sounds like mozilla sso is going to be required to log in to heroku soon
do y'all log into heroku today? If so we may need to confirm that everything still works for you
wanted to give y'all a heads up, although it sounds like they'll be sending emails to contributors too
very rarely, I imagine more relevant to crates.io folks though

tbh it seems like the kind of thing they already tried to do several months back, and that didn't end up going through? I'll probably wait until I actually need the access to actually figure out how to do this
ugh @Alex Crichton, manish already pinged me about it, and it doesn't sound great
I'll need to ask why they need an nda to have access to that :/
getting the nda for most of the crates.io team doesn't make sense (a lot of them have access to staging)
we will not be cut off until we figure how to manage this out, even if it ends up taking after july 31st
